description:
Advanced civil engineering design projects; philosophy of design & selection of systems; risk assessment; integrated design focussing on structures, geomechanics & transport engineering.
[Note: Students will be required to meet costs associated with copying of design reports prior to submission.]
prerequisites: CIVL2360 and CIVL3210 and CIVL3340 and CIVL3350 and CIVL3420
incompatible: CIVL4510 or CIVL4530 or CIVL4513 or CIVL4511 or CIVL4512
